name: CNBC
text: “I think there’s a good chance we’ll have substantial death rate reduction by the end of the year.” Here’s what billionaire philanthropist @BillGates is watching in terms of coronavirus treatment and vaccine development. https://t.co/gz88qas9CF https://t.co/7ZWJ8e0c4G

name: CNBC
text:
RT @annierpalmer: Amazon released Jeff Bezos' prepared remarks ahead of tomorrow's hearing. The main theme appears to be how Amazon is the quintessential American company: 

- Giving Main Street businesses a platform
- Creating jobs in the U.S.
- Customer is always right
https://t.co/jSWm1tPvy0
